titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend permanently the election to deduct State and local general sales taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
4/9/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent provisions allowing a taxpayer to elect to deduct state and local general sales taxes in lieu of state and local income taxes.
